name: Yet Another DOOM Sound PWAD (for DOOM ][)
description: Simply a boring little escapade into the wild world of trying to make DOOM ][ a bit more bearable after you've played it way too many times. Where the hell is Heretic? Most of you should just stop reading this and go try it. (If you're really intensly afflicted by DOOM, you might want to check out the rest of this, as there are details on every little thing that was done to make this PWAD.)
